titleStmt.title: Inscription relating to building works in Portus (Ostia) probably made by the praet. and urban prefect Ulpius Limenius

availability.licence: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

support.rs: yes, reused in a pit tomb excavated after the 10th century inside the christian basilica

layout.rs: Fragmentary. It consists of five joining fragments that form the lower left corner of an originally larger epigraphic field.

handNote.term: Late-antique elegant capital; elongated letters; ‘A’ with broken horizontal stroke.

history.provenance: Christian Basilica of Portus (Ostia), South side of the Trajan’s port

div.p: “... restored (?) ... Ulpius Limenius ... responsible for the restoration ...”
“... il a restauré (?) ... Ulpius Limenius ... responsable de la restauration ...”
“... restaurò (?) ... Ulpius Limenius ... curando il restauro ...”
